Query.Select: *[System[ (EventID=4672) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 86400000] ]] and *[EventData[ Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-18' and Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-20' and Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-90-0-1' and Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-90-0-2' ]]
